snippet: In his biggest game as a pro, Tim Tebow disproved his legions of naysayers by connecting on throws against man coverage, with the help of offensive coordinator Mike McCoy and receiver Demaryius Thomas.
abstract: In his biggest game as a pro, Tim Tebow disproved his legions of naysayers by connecting on throws against man coverage, with the help of offensive coordinator Mike McCoy and receiver Demaryius Thomas.
lead_paragraph: A quick analysis of this past weekend's four wild-card games:

headline.main: How Tebow and His Helpers Beat Man Coverage
